title: Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth         Junior Rangers with badges at Florissant Fossil Beds NPS Photo  Junior Ranger Explore the park, complete fun activities, earn a badge or patch. Become a Junior Ranger!            Junior Ranger Music Listen or download fun, danceable, singeable music designed just for Junior Rangers.           Every Kid in a Park The Every Kid in a Park Initiative provides free access to every 4th grade student and their guests to visit national parks and other federal areas. Download your voucher and get more information.            Junior Explorer: Geology of the Gold Belt Byway This is a downloadable activity book for kids all about the Gold Belt Byway which runs from Florissant Fossil Beds to Canon City, CO          Webrangers Customize your own ranger station, go on adventures, earn rewards. Become a webranger!
